Value.label: Set to Default
Value.Help: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).

Value.label: Feedback Time
Value.Help: To configure the time the beep is automatically turned off in seconds.

Value.label: Feedback Timeout
Value.Help: To configure the timeout to wait for a WAKEUP_NO_MORE_INFORMATION before the error beep is automatically sound. The error beeps are fixed 8 beeps shortly after each other.

Value.label: Feedback Beeps per Second
Value.Help: To configure the number of beeps per second. Every beep is fixed about 10ms.

Value.label: The Mode
Value.Help: To configure the operating mode. If any mode other then 3, that value will be reported after a get but will be handled in SW as mode 1.

Item.label: Mode 3: Z-Wave chip is always on to request e.g. version or manufacturer id.

Value.label: RFID circuit startup time
Value.Help: The time (*10 ms) that the RFID circuit is started after home or away is pressed (default 100 = 100*10ms=1s)
